other_tests.findings: Innumerable small gallstones within gallbladder lumen; 0.3 cm stone in the distal common bile duct; borderline common bile duct diameter 0.7 cm; no intrahepatic bile duct dilatation; mild linear gallbladder wall enhancement; 3 small benign hepatic cysts; normal pancreas; lipid-rich benign 2.5 cm left adrenal adenoma; multiple small benign cysts in both kidneys; 2 cm dark T2 exophytic lesion in the left kidney consistent with hemorrhagic cyst.
